note:
I'm a Dutch, freelance webdev who moved from Amsterdam to Tennessee in April 2016. "It's fine", I thought at the time. "There's no way Americans will actually vote that dumb fuck into office." We've been living in the dumbest timeline ever since.

Y'all means all 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️
Black Lives Matter ✊
The Dude abides 🍹
Biden/Harris 2024 🇺🇸
